pageProduct.name: Optimum Nutrition Amino Energy Watermelon 30 Serve 270g
pageProduct.description:
Information

*Visit www.chemistwarehouse.com.au/competitions to find out more

Why Choose Amin.O. Energy?

Whether you need to switch on and perform in the gym, boost energy levels and focus throughout the day, or recover from your workout Amin.O. Energy gives you everything you need to perform at your peak anywhere, anytime.

Anytime Energy

Boost your energy before training, in the gym, during an afternoon slump, anytime & anywhere.

Perform At Your Peak

Whenever you need to switch on and perform, Amin.O. Energy is ready to go.

Recover

Support your muscle recovery after intense exercise.

Switch On

Caffeine enhances physical and cognitive performance by making us feel more switched on and energised

Amino Acid Blend

Amino Acids can promote more effective muscle repair as they help in supporting muscle protein synthesis.

ZERO Sugar

Only 5 to 10 calories per serving with ZERO sugar.

Informed Choice

We use only the highest quality ingredients and our products are regularly tested for banned substances.

How To Use Amin.O. Energy?

Mix anwhere from 2-6 scoops into 300mL - 400mL of cold water, you can scale up or down depending on your energy needs, first thing in the morning, before or after exercise, or any time you need to boost your energy and muscle recovery.

Over 35 years, our obsessive pursuit of the highest quality standards has only been matched by our desire to see you achieve your goals.

For 2 billion Optimum Nutrition workouts around the world, we've helped anybody who ever had a fitness aspiration and believed that they could achieve it, from elite athletes to everyday gym goers and amateur sportsman.

But there's still one workout that is more important than any other, yours, make it count.

A Legacy Of Trust

For over 35 year, Optimum Nutrition has been the brand professional athletes and gym enthusiasts trust to support their fitness journey.

Dedicated To Your Goals

Over 2 billion times all around the world, we've dedicated ourselves to helping others achieve their fitness goals.

Obsessed With Quality

Using only the highest quality raw ingredients, we test and re-test to every step of the way. Just like you, we care about what goes into your body.

General Information

Anytime Energy And Workout Recovery Whether you need to switch on and perform in the gym, boost energy levels and focus throughout the day, or recover from your workout Amin.O. Energy gives you everything you need to perform at your peak anywhere, anytime. Why Use Amin.O. Energy? • Energy & Workout Recovery Anytime, Anywhere • Essential Amino Acid Delivery • 100mg of Caffeine From Natural Sources per Serving • 5g of Blended Amino Acids • Zero Sugar What Is Amin.O. Energy Used For? • Enhancing Physical Performance • Boosting Energy & Focus Anytime, Anywhere • Supporting Muscle Growth & Maintenance • Supporting Post-Workout Recovery

Warnings

To be consumed as part of a balanced & nutritious diet. This product contains caffeine and Phenylalanine and is not recommended for children, women who are pregnant, trying to get pregnant or lactating, or individuals sensitive to caffeine or Beta-Alanine. Should only be used under medical or dietetic supervision.

Common Uses

Mix up ESSENTIAL AMIN.O. ENERGY anytime you want a fruit flavored inspired boost of energy and alertness. You can determine what's appropriate for any situation, adding a 2-scoop serving to water for an afternoon pick-me-up or increasing the amino acid matrix to 10 grams with a 4-scoop pre-workout drink that delivers 200 mg of caffeine from green coffee and green tea extracts.

  • Essential Amino Acid Delivery
  • Muscle Recovery
  • Energy and Focus

Ingredients

Amino Blend (Taurine, L-Glutamine, L-Arginine, L-Leucine, Beta-Alanine (as CarnoSyn®), Citrulline, L-Isoleucine, L-Valine, L-Tyrosine, L-Histidine, L-Lysine HCl, L-Phenylalanine, L-Threonine, L-Methionine)(Emulsifier: SOY Lecithin), Acidity Regulators (296, 330, 334), Flavors, Anti-caking Agents (551, 552), Energy Blend (Caffeine [from tea and/or coffee bean], Green Tea Leaf Extract, Green Coffee Extract [bean]), Sweetener (955), Thickeners (460, 415, 407), Color (162), Inulin.

Directions

How To Use Amin.O. Energy Mix about 2-6 scoops into 300mL – 400mL of cold water first thing in the morning, before or after exercise, or any time you need to boost your energy and muscle recovery.
